name: EA Sports FC 25
smalldes: The latest installment in the EA Sports football simulation series, featuring realistic gameplay, improved career mode, and online multiplayer matches with updated teams and leagues.
largedes:
THE BEAUTIFUL GAME, REIMAGINED :- Experience next-gen football with fluid gameplay, realistic physics, and strategic depth. Take your team to glory on the grandest stage.

YOUR CLUB, YOUR LEGACY :- Master career mode, dominate online, or create the ultimate squad in FIFA Ultimate Team. Every goal, pass, and tackle matters.
dialouge: ‚öΩ FEEL THE GAME, LIVE THE GLORY

min.cpu: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600

max.cpu: Intel Core i7-6700 or AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
max.gpu: NVIDIA RTX 2070 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT

name: Elden Ring
smalldes: An epic open-world action RPG by FromSoftware, blending deep lore, challenging combat, and breathtaking landscapes. Explore a vast world, fight monstrous foes, and uncover the secrets of the Elden Ring.
largedes:
RISE, TARNISHED, AND CLAIM GLORY :- Explore a vast, haunting world filled with ancient secrets, deadly foes, and legendary bosses. Forge your own path to power.

CHALLENGE, ADAPT, OVERCOME :- From towering castles to desolate wastelands, each battle is a test of skill. Master combat, wield powerful magic, and uncover the mysteries of the Elden Ring.

min.cpu: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
min.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 4 GB

warn: For: 16+ only -> Fantasy Violence, Mild Blood

name: Fortnite
smalldes: A colorful battle royale game where players build structures, collect weapons, and fight in an ever-shrinking map. Features frequent updates, collaborations, and an ever-evolving game world.
largedes:
BUILD, BATTLE, WIN :- Engage in fast-paced battles where creativity meets combat. Construct structures, outmaneuver opponents, and claim the Victory Royale.

ENDLESS POSSIBILITIES, LIMITLESS FUN :- From classic battle royale to custom creative maps, Fortnite offers non-stop action with constant updates and new challenges.

max.gpu: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Super / AMD Radeon RX 5600XT

name: Farm Simulator 25
smalldes: Farming Simulator 25 lets you build and manage your dream farm, cultivate crops, raise livestock, and operate a variety of realistic farming machinery.
largedes:
BUILD YOUR AGRICULTURAL EMPIRE :- Manage your farm with cutting-edge machinery, cultivate crops, and take care of livestock. Expand your fields and maximize your yields in a dynamic, evolving world.

FARM WITH FREEDOM & PRECISION :- Customize your farm, collaborate in multiplayer, and experience realistic farming simulation with the latest vehicles and equipment. Every decision shapes your success.

min.cpu: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
min.gpu: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 470

max.cpu: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
max.gpu: Nvidia RTX 3060 / AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT

name: Gran Turismo 7
smalldes: A realistic racing simulation featuring meticulously detailed cars and tracks. Compete in stunning visuals with precise driving mechanics, tuning options, and online racing challenges.
largedes:
EXPERIENCE RACING PERFECTION :- Push the limits of speed with ultra-realistic car physics, stunning tracks, and precision driving in the most refined racing simulator ever made.

MASTER EVERY TURN, OWN EVERY TRACK :- From iconic circuits to high-speed city races, feel the rush of real motorsport with unmatched realism and competitive challenges.
desc: The road is my battlefield, and speed is my sword!
warn: For Adrenaline Junkies Only ‚Üí Extreme Speed, High-Octane Action!

name: Hitman 3
smalldes: Step into the shoes of Agent 47, a professional assassin, and execute high-profile targets across breathtaking locations. Use disguises, stealth, and creative strategies to eliminate foes.
largedes:
SILENCE IS YOUR DEADLIEST WEAPON :- Step into the shoes of Agent 47 and execute high-stakes assassinations in breathtaking locations across the globe.

PLAN, EXECUTE, DISAPPEAR :- Every target has multiple approaches‚Äîbe creative, stay undetected, and eliminate your enemies with precision.

min.cpu: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940

max.gpu: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56

name: PUBG
smalldes: A battle royale shooter where 100 players drop onto an island, scavenge for weapons, and fight to be the last one standing.
largedes:
SURVIVE, LOOT, CONQUER :- Drop into a massive battleground where survival is the only rule. Scavenge weapons, plan your strategy, and be the last one standing.

EVERY DECISION COUNTS :- Whether you go in guns blazing or take a stealthy approach, every match is unpredictable. Adapt, strategize, and claim that Chicken Dinner.

min.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB

name: Valorant
smalldes: VALORANT is a character-based 5v5 tactical shooter set on the global stage. Outwit, outplay, and outshine your competition with tactical abilities, precise gunplay, and adaptive teamwork.
largedes:
FIGHT AROUND THE WORLD :- Blend your style and experience on a global, competitive stage. Attack and defend your side using sharp gunplay and tactical abilities. And, with one life per round, you'll have to think faster than your opponent if you want to survive.

CREATIVITY IS YOUR GREATEST WEAPON :- More than guns and bullets, you will choose an Agent armed with adaptive, swift, and lethal abilities that create opportunities to let your gunplay shine. Each map is purpose-built for team strategies, spectacular plays, and clutch moments. Make the plays others will imitate for years to come.

min.cpu: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 / AMD Athlon 200GE
min.gpu: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon R5 200 (1GB VRAM)

name: Werewolf: The Apocalypse
smalldes: An action RPG set in the World of Darkness universe. Play as a werewolf fighting against an evil corporation, using brute strength, stealth, and supernatural abilities.
largedes:
UNLEASH THE BEAST WITHIN :- Transform into a ferocious werewolf and battle against dark forces threatening the world. Embrace your rage and let your fury guide you.

CHOOSE YOUR PATH, SHAPE YOUR DESTINY :- Balance between human intellect and primal savagery as you fight for nature against corrupt corporations and supernatural threats.

smalldes: Step into the boots of Eivor, a Viking warrior,and conquer England through raids, diplomacy, and epic battles.Explore a vast open world with rich storytelling and RPG elements.
largedes:
BECOME A LEGENDARY VIKING :- Raid, conquer, and carve your destiny in a rich open world set in the Dark Ages. Build your clan‚Äôs settlement and write your own saga.

STRATEGY, STEALTH, AND BRUTAL COMBAT :- Utilize tactical combat, master the art of assassination, and shape history with choices that define your Viking journey.
warn: For: 18+ only -> Violence, Blood, Mild Language

NO ROOM FOR HESITATION :- Engage in intense, fast-paced combat where every shot counts. Master modern weaponry and outmaneuver your enemies in high-stakes battles.

TACTICAL WARFARE REDEFINED :- Play through gripping single-player campaigns, test your skills in multiplayer, and dominate in adrenaline-fueled battles across legendary maps.

name: Call Of Duty Warzone
smalldes: A free-to-play battle royale shooter where players drop into a massive open-world battlefield. Survive against opponents using tactical combat, vehicles, and team-based strategies.
largedes:
NO SECOND CHANCES, NO MERCY :- Drop into a massive warzone where strategy and reflexes determine survival. Loot, fight, and outlast your enemies in epic battle royale encounters.

ADAPT TO EVERY SITUATION :- From sniping in open fields to close-quarters gunfights, every moment demands precision. Team up, strategize, and claim victory.
desc: The last one standing writes the saga!

name: Dead By Daylight
smalldes: A multiplayer horror survival game where four survivors try to escape a terrifying killer. Use stealth, teamwork, and strategy to evade death and repair generators to escape.
largedes:
A DEADLY GAME OF HUNT AND ESCAPE :- Step into the fog where every match is a thrilling chase. Play as a ruthless killer or a desperate survivor in a multiplayer horror showdown.

EVERY CHOICE IS LIFE OR DEATH :- Work together to escape or embrace the darkness. With a variety of killers and survivors, no two games are ever the same.
warn: For: 18+ only -> Strong Horror, Violence, Blood

min.cpu: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
smalldes: An epic tale of life in America at the dawn of the modern age, filled with action, exploration, and unforgettable storytelling.
largedes:
LIVE THE OUTLAW LIFE :- Step into the boots of Arthur Morgan, a rugged outlaw navigating loyalty, morality, and survival in the fading Wild West.

IMMERSIVE OPEN WORLD :- From snowy mountains to muddy towns, hunt, ride, rob, or simply explore one of the most detailed worlds ever created.
desc: America, 1899. Live like an outlaw. Survive like a legend.
warn: 18+ only -> Strong Violence, Language, Drug Use

name: Hogwarts Legacy
smalldes: An immersive open-world RPG set in the wizarding world of the 1800s. Discover magical secrets and shape your legacy.
largedes:
YOUR LEGACY BEGINS :- Attend Hogwarts, master spells, brew potions, and uncover a hidden truth threatening the magical world.

CHOOSE YOUR PATH :- Be the witch or wizard you want to be, explore forbidden magic, and make choices that shape the future of Hogwarts.
